scripts.deploy: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.patch: gulp && git add . && npm version patch --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
scripts.minor: gulp && git add . && npm version minor --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
scripts.major: gulp && git add . && npm version major --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
